If there are multiple(e.g. 5) failed Authentication within 1 second from the same IP Address 
eg - Date: 2023-08-20 15:30:45 Username: jdoe IP Address: 192.168.1.100 Authentication Result: Failed Reason: Incorrect password
Date: 2023-08-20 15:30:48 Username: jdoe IP Address: 192.168.1.100 Authentication Result: Failed Reason: Incorrect password

Date: 2023-08-20 15:30:55 Username: jdoe IP Address: 192.168.1.100 Authentication Result: Failed Reason: Incorrect password
Date: 2023-08-20 15:31:02 Username: jdoe IP Address: 192.168.1.100 Authentication Result: Failed Reason: Incorrect password
The Log is uncompliant and the action taken should be to monitor the activity.
